sentences.en: ...the rapid expansion of private health insurance.
a period of rapid economic expansion
A rise in the temperature of the gas results in its expansion.
sentences.cn: 气体温度上升致使气体膨胀.

sentences.en: Expansion joints of various kinds are fitted on gas mains.
sentences.cn: 各种各样的伸缩接头被安装在煤气的总管道上了.

sentences.en: Expansion joints of various kinds are fitted on steam pipes.
sentences.cn: 各种各样的伸缩接头被安装在蒸气管道上了.

sentences.en: Future expansion of the business calls for two new factories.
sentences.cn: 将来业务扩大需要建造两个新工厂.

sentences.en: His big book is an expansion of the little book he wrote before.
sentences.cn: 他这本大部头的书是在他以前写的一本小册子的基础上扩充而成的.

sentences.en: Industrialization inevitably led to the expansion of the urban working class.
sentences.cn: 工业化不可避免地导致了城市工人阶级人数的增多.

sentences.en: One of the driving forces behind this recent expansion is the growth of services.
sentences.cn: 最近的这次经济扩张背后的主要推动力量之一是服务业的增长。

sentences.en: the expansion and contraction of the metal
The forces of expansion are balanced by forces of contraction.
sentences.cn: 扩张力和收缩力相互平衡.

sentences.en: The industry underwent a period of rapid expansion.
sentences.cn: 该产业经历了一轮快速扩张。

sentences.en: The memory expansion cards are useful adjuncts to the computer.
sentences.cn: 内存扩充卡是计算机很有用的附件。

sentences.en: The novel is an expansion of a short story he wrote about forty years ago.
sentences.cn: 这部小说由他大约40年前写的一篇短篇小说扩展而成。

sentences.en: The rapid expansion of cities can cause social and economic problems.
sentences.cn: 城市规模的迅速扩大会带来各种社会和经济问题。

sentences.en: The runway of this airport is undergoing expansion to accommodate large planes.
sentences.cn: 这个机场的跑道正在扩建以适应大型飞机起落.

sentences.en: The vast expansion in secondary education is putting an enormous strain on the system.
sentences.cn: 中等教育的大幅扩张正对该系统造成巨大压力。

sentences.en: Their desire for expansion has increased.
sentences.cn: 他们的扩张欲望有增无减.

sentences.en: We mustn't attempt unrestricted expansion regardless if it is within our capacity.
sentences.cn: 我们不能不顾自己的能力企图无限制地发展.

words.tran_cn: 可扩张的；扩大的；膨胀性的
宽阔；广阔的区域；苍天；膨胀扩张
扩张主义；扩张政策；膨胀主义
领土扩张论者；扩张主义者
扩大性；膨胀系数；可膨胀性

phrases.tran_cn: 业务扩张，营业扩充；经济高涨
膨胀系数，膨胀率；展开系数
伸缩缝；补偿器；伸缩接头；膨胀节或缝
展开图；扩充方案；扩展计划

trans.tran_en: when a company, business etc becomes larger by opening new shops, factories etc
